A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film is hot garbage juice. Pretty hot garbage juice\, but garbage juice nonetheless. Nonsensical character arcs\, pointless characters\, pointless story-crushing \"twists\" and a truly short-sighted view to the franchise by the director/writers pushed purely to help push an agenda. 1 star for the visuals\, 1 star for the truly fantastic performance from some of the actors in the face of their terrible script.
